name: They're 'armless
description:
You are a contestant in a new blood sport, the rules are that you can only attack the opposition by throwing yours, and their, limbs at them. How long will you be able to survive against an ever increasing wave of enemies?

Controls 

Movement - WASD or analog stick

Attacks - Throwing Limbs 

- Left Arm - left mouse click or Left trigger

- Right Arm - right mouse click or Right trigger

-Left Leg - Q or Left Bumper

-Right Leg - E or Right Bumper

Credits:

All programming done by thedarkmagi and AFKmuch

All Art Created by thedarkmagi

All fonts used from Kenney

All Game music is from this pack

All sound effects used are from this pack

We are two programmers living in the south of England studying Computer Games (Software Development) at university.
